item.title: Lookup table maintenance in Hive
item.description: A lookup table is a translation table, aimed to enrich and extend base data. Such tables are very common, especially in data warehousing (schema normalisation) and business analytics area. Usually, they are updated manually and developers are constantly looking for the ways to simplify maintenance. This article shows how to work with lookup tables in Hive using National Hockey League open data. Data Let’s consider the following example: base table consists of San Jose Sharks 2016-2017 NHL season schedule.
